statements: SELECT * FROM vegetation_indices WHERE region_name = 'North Carolina';
SELECT id, region_name, ndvi, evi FROM vegetation_indices WHERE date_observed = '2021-09-01';
SELECT * FROM vegetation_indices WHERE latitude > 30 AND longitude < -100;
SELECT region_name, evi FROM vegetation_indices ORDER BY date_observed DESC;
SELECT region_name, ndvi FROM vegetation_indices WHERE ndvi > 0.5 AND evi < 0.4 ORDER BY longitude ASC, latitude DESC;
SELECT * FROM vegetation_indices WHERE region_name='East' AND date_observed='2022-01-01' ORDER BY ndvi DESC, evi ASC
SELECT region_name, latitude, longitude, ndvi FROM vegetation_indices WHERE ndvi > 0.6 ORDER BY latitude DESC
SELECT id, region_name, longitude FROM vegetation_indices WHERE evi BETWEEN 0.4 AND 0.6 AND date_observed > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY region_name
SELECT * FROM vegetation_indices WHERE region_name='West' OR region_name='South' ORDER BY date_observed DESC
SELECT region_name, latitude, longitude, date_observed FROM vegetation_indices WHERE ndvi < 0.3 AND date_observed < '2022-04-01' ORDER BY date_observed ASC
SELECT * FROM vegetation_indices;
SELECT latitude, longitude FROM vegetation_indices WHERE index_name = 'NDVI' ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT index_name, index_value FROM vegetation_indices WHERE latitude > 30 AND longitude < 50;
SELECT id, file_path FROM satellite_images WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM satellite_images WHERE id = 10;
SELECT * FROM vegetation_indices ORDER BY id DESC, latitude ASC
SELECT latitude, longitude, index_name FROM vegetation_indices WHERE index_value > 0.5 ORDER BY index_value DESC
SELECT * FROM vegetation_indices WHERE latitude BETWEEN 20.0 AND 30.0 AND longitude BETWEEN 40.0 AND 50.0
SELECT index_name, AVG(index_value) AS avg_value FROM vegetation_indices GROUP BY index_name HAVING AVG(index_value) > 0.7
SELECT vi.id, vi.index_name, si.timestamp FROM vegetation_indices vi JOIN satellite_images si ON vi.id = si.id
SELECT * FROM vegetation_indices WHERE ndvi > 0.5;
SELECT pixel_x, pixel_y FROM vegetation_indices WHERE id = 10;
SELECT capture_date FROM satellite_images WHERE image_id = 25;
SELECT * FROM vegetation_indices ORDER BY ndvi DESC;
SELECT image_id, capture_date FROM satellite_images WHERE capture_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT * FROM vegetation_indices WHERE ndvi > 0.5;
SELECT pixel_x, pixel_y, ndvi FROM vegetation_indices WHERE pixel_x < 100 AND pixel_y < 100 ORDER BY ndvi DESC;
SELECT image_id, capture_date FROM satellite_images WHERE capture_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM image_processing_log WHERE success = true;
SELECT process_date, success FROM image_processing_log ORDER BY process_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM spatial_distribution;
SELECT id, index_name, longitude, latitude FROM spatial_distribution WHERE id = 1;
SELECT index_name, latitude, longitude FROM spatial_distribution ORDER BY latitude DESC;
SELECT * FROM vegetation_indices WHERE index_value > 0.5;
SELECT data_source_name, data_type, source_url FROM data_sources;
SELECT * FROM spatial_distribution WHERE id = 1;
SELECT index_name, longitude, latitude FROM spatial_distribution WHERE longitude > 0;
SELECT image_url FROM spatial_distribution WHERE index_name LIKE '%NDVI%';
SELECT id, index_name, longitude, latitude FROM spatial_distribution WHERE latitude < 0;
SELECT id, data_source_name, data_type, source_url FROM data_sources WHERE data_type = 'satellite';
SELECT * FROM ndvi_values;
SELECT image_id, ndvi_value FROM ndvi_values WHERE longitude < 0;
SELECT image_name, image_date FROM satellite_images WHERE sensor_type = 'Landsat';
SELECT source_name, source_url FROM image_sources ORDER BY source_id DESC;
SELECT type_name, description FROM vegetation_types WHERE type_id > 5;
SELECT * FROM ndvi_values WHERE latitude > 30
SELECT image_name, image_date FROM satellite_images ORDER BY image_date DESC
SELECT type_name, description FROM vegetation_types WHERE type_id = 3
SELECT process_id, process_date, processing_steps FROM image_processing WHERE process_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY process_date ASC
SELECT source_name, source_url FROM image_sources WHERE source_id IN (1, 3, 5)
